name.description: The name of the Azure Analysis Services server to create. Server name must begin with a letter, be lowercase alphanumeric, and between 3 and 63 characters in length.

sku.description: The SKU (pricing tier) of the Analysis Services instance.

capacity.description: The total number of query replica scale-out instances.

Sku.description: The SKU (pricing tier) of the Analysis Services instance.

managedMode.description: The managed mode of the server (0 = not managed, 1 = managed).

gatewayResourceId.description: The resource id of the azure gateway resource

dmtsClusterUri.description: The cluster uri of the data movement service

gatewayDetails.description: The details of the gateway associated with the server

querypoolConnectionMode.description: The query pool connection mode for AS server

rangeStart.description: The start of the IP address range (inclusive)

rangeEnd.description: The end of the IP address range (inclusive)

enablePowerBIService.description: The value indicating whether to enable Power BI access

serverMonitorMode.description: The server monitor mode for AS server

administrator.description: The UPN of the Analysis Services instance administrator.
